app_name: Groups Control Groups Voice Recording and Karaoke Apps Sing King The Home of Karaoke
app_description: Sing King Sing It Your Way with our BRAND NEW Game Mode beta our original Classic Karaoke Mode! Non stop free karaoke! Sing wherever whenever and enjoy unlimited full length Karaoke videos for FREE. Be one of the 20 million that enjoy Karaoke with Sing King every month! With the very latest chart hits added daily discover Karaoke to your favourite new songs on Sing King before anywhere else. NEW Introducing Our Karaoke Game beta ! Sing along to your favourite tracks and be scored on your performance Earn up to 5 stars a special medal on a song and climb the leaderboards Challenge other singers from around the world on the leaderboards The 1 YouTube karaoke channel is now available as an app! Sing King is the world s biggest Karaoke community. Be Swift. Have Styles. Go Grande. Head West. And most importantly Sing It Your Way! Why you ll love Sing King Karaoke: Sing along to thousands of Karaoke lyric videos for FREE NEW Game beta ! Get scored on your singing and earn stars to climb the leaderboards! Join our community of 20 million users that enjoy Karaoke with Sing King every month! All Karaoke videos are available for free including the latest chart and viral hits New songs added daily and available to all users! Carry all of your favourite songs in your pocket with offline mode no connection necessary! Create your own playlists The highest quality video audio lyrics Browse pop hits rock country and hip hop classics K pop tunes and more The most accurate smoothest Karaoke lyric sweep! Enjoy Karaoke across all your mobile and tablet devices with full cross platform accounts! Choose from our existing playlists or make your own : Feelin Motivated Songs To Sing In The Shower Let s Dance Best of 00s Country Karaoke Songs Top Karaoke Duets Global Chart Karaoke Songs Songs from all your favourite artists including : Olivia Rodrigo Ed Sheeran Lewis Capaldi Billie Eilish Lionel Ritchie Dua Lipa Elvis Presley Whitney Houston Come and visit us at https: singking.com Youtube https: www.youtube.com c singkingkaraoke Facebook https: en gb.facebook.com singkingkaraoke Instagram singkingkaraoke Twitter singkingkaraoke SING KING PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION : Sing your heart out! Go PREMIUM to get ad free playback for an uninterrupted Karaoke experience and the ability to download content to enjoy with no connection needed! Sing King Premium is available as a subscription weekly monthly or yearly or for limited fixed periods such as our 48 hour Party Pass . All subscriptions are on an auto renewal basis unless cancelled 24 hours prior to the end of any free trial or subscription period. Unused portion of a free premium trial period if offered will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription during the free trial. Payment will be charged to your iTunes account and therefore to cancel go to your Apple ID account settings. Our full terms of use can be found here: https: singking.com terms And our privacy policy is here: https: singking.com privacy
